body: Sana Saleem slams the people who are uttering words of sympathy for the killer of the Punjab governor Salman Taseer. She says: "there’s no justification for his murder, and every single one who instigated violence, has blood on their hands."
original_body: Sana Saleem slams the people who are uttering words of sympathy for the killer of the Punjab governor Salman Taseer. She says: "there’s no justification for his murder, and every single one who instigated violence, has blood on their hands."
title: Pakistan: There Is No Justification For Murder
